outputs.name: recipe
outputs.description:
A simulation recipe that contains a simulation instructions and
input arguments. Use the "HB Run Recipe" component to execute the
recipe and get results.

inputs.name: _model
inputs.description:
A Honeybee Model for which Daylight Factor will be simulated.
Note that this model should have grids assigned to it in order
to produce meaningfule results.

inputs.name: sensor_count_
inputs.description:
Integer for the maximum number of sensor grid points per
parallel execution. (Default: 200).

inputs.name: radiance_par_
inputs.description:
Text for the radiance parameters to be used for ray
tracing. (Default: -ab 2 -aa 0.1 -ad 2048 -ar 64).

name: HB Daylight Factor
description: Run daylight factor for a single model.
